item.title: Issue Let's Encrypt certificate using HTTP-01 challenge with cert-manager
item.description: New to Voyager? Please start here. Issue Let’s Encrypt certificate using HTTP-01 challenge with cert-manager 1. Setup Issuer/ClusterIssuer Setup a ClusterIssuer (Or Issuer) for your Ingress by applying this clusterissuer.yaml apiVersion: cert-manager.io/v1 kind: ClusterIssuer metadata: name: letsencrypt-staging spec: acme: # You must replace this email address with your own. # Let's Encrypt will use this to contact you about expiring # certificates, and issues related to your account. email: user@example.
